00054     WorldQueryTool::WorldQueryTool()
00055     {
00056         // create the ray scene query object
00057         this->RayQuery = this->GameWorld->GetSceneManager()->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createRayQuery(Ogre::Ray(), Ogre::SceneManager::WORLD_GEOMETRY_TYPE_MASK);
00058         if (NULL == this->RayQuery)
00059             {this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Failed to create RaySceneQuery instance in WorldQueryTool"); }
00060         this->RayQuery->setSortByDistance(true);
00061     }
00062 
00063     WorldQueryTool::~WorldQueryTool()
00064     {
00065         delete this->RayQuery;
00066     }
00067 
00068     ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00069     // Raycasting Nonsense goe here
00070     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByPolygon(Ray ActorRay)
00071     {
00072         Ogre::Ray Ooray = ActorRay.GetOgreRay();
00073 
00074         if(NULL != this->RayQuery)          //Double check that the Rayquery is valid
00075         {
00076             this->RayQuery->setRay(Ooray);
00077             if( this->RayQuery->execute().size() <= 0 ) //Did we hit anything
00078             {
00079                 return NULL;
00080             }
00081         }else{                          //Whoopsie something Failed
00082             this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Attempting to run a query on Null RaySceneQuery");
00083         }
00084 
00085         // at this point we have raycast to a series of different objects bounding boxes.
00086         // we need to test these different objects to see which is the first polygon hit.
00087         // there are some minor optimizations (distance based) that mean we wont have to
00088         // check all of the objects most of the time, but the worst case scenario is that
00089         // we need to test every triangle of every object.
00090         Ogre::Real closest_distance = -1.0f;
00091         Vector3 closest_result;
00092         Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult &query_result = this->RayQuery->getLastResults();
00093         Vector3WActor* ClosestActor = new Vector3WActor();
00094         for (size_t qr_idx = 0; qr_idx < query_result.size(); qr_idx++)
00095         {
00096             // stop checking if we have found a raycast hit that is closer than all remaining entities
00097             if ( (0.0f <= closest_distance) && (closest_distance < query_result[qr_idx].distance))
00098                 { break; }
00099 
00100             // only check this result if its a hit against an entity
00101             if ((NULL != query_result[qr_idx].movable) && (0 == query_result[qr_idx].movable->getMovableType().compare("Entity")))
00102             {
00103                 // get the entity to check
00104                 Ogre::Entity *pentity = static_cast<Ogre::Entity*>(query_result[qr_idx].movable);
00105 
00106                 // mesh data to retrieve
00107                 size_t vertex_count;
00108                 size_t index_count;
00109                 Ogre::Vector3 *vertices;
00110                 unsigned long *indices;
00111 
00112                 // get the mesh information
00113                 this->GetMeshInformation(pentity, vertex_count, vertices, index_count, indices,
00114                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedPosition(),
00115                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedOrientation(),
00116                                   pentity->getParentNode()->_getDerivedScale());
00117 
00118                 // test for hitting individual triangles on the mesh
00119                 bool new_closest_found = false;
00120                 for (size_t i = 0; i < index_count; i += 3)
00121                 {
00122                     // check for a hit against this triangle
00123                     std::pair<bool, Ogre::Real> hit = Ogre::Math::intersects(Ooray, vertices[indices[i]], vertices[indices[i+1]], vertices[indices[i+2]], true, false);
00124 
00125                     // if it was a hit check if its the closest
00126                     if (hit.first && ((0.0f > closest_distance) || (hit.second < closest_distance)) )
00127                     {
00128                         closest_distance = hit.second;                        // this is the closest so far, save it off
00129                         new_closest_found = true;
00130                     }
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 // free the verticies and indicies memory
00134                 delete[] vertices;
00135                 delete[] indices;
00136 
00137                 // if we found a new closest raycast for this object, update the closest_result before moving on to the next object.
00138                 if (new_closest_found)
00139                 {
00140                     closest_result = Ooray.getPoint(closest_distance);
00141                     ClosestActor->Actor = this->GameWorld->GetActorManager()->FindActor( pentity->getParentNode() );
00142                 }
00143             } // \if entity
00144         } // \if qr_idx
00145 
00146         //Change the closest point into a point relative to the Actor
00147         if (ClosestActor->Actor != NULL)
00148             { ClosestActor->Vector = closest_result - ClosestActor->Actor->GetLocation(); }
00149         return ClosestActor;
00150     }

00152     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB(Ray ActorRay)
00153     {
00154         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00155         this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB:");
00156         #endif
00157         Ogre::Ray Ooray = ActorRay.GetOgreRay();
00158 
00159         if(NULL != this->RayQuery)          //Double check that the Rayquery is valid
00160         {
00161             this->RayQuery->setRay(Ooray);
00162             if( this->RayQuery->execute().size() <= 0 ) //Did we hit anything
00163             {
00164                 return NULL;
00165             }
00166         }else{                          //Whoopsie something Failed
00167             this->GameWorld->LogAndThrow("Attempting to run a query on Null RaySceneQuery");
00168         }
00169 
00170         Ogre::RaySceneQueryResult &query_result = this->RayQuery->getLastResults();
00171 
00172         if (0 < query_result.size())
00173         {
00174             Ogre::Entity *pentity = static_cast<Ogre::Entity*>(query_result[0].movable);
00175             Vector3WActor* ClosestActor = new Vector3WActor();
00176             ClosestActor->Actor = this->GameWorld->GetActorManager()->FindActor( pentity->getParentNode() );
00177             /// @todo TODO: The function WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB does not return an valid offset. This needs to be calculated somehow.
00178             /// @todo TODO: The function WorldQueryTool::GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB has not been tested and needs to be tested
00179             return ClosestActor;
00180         }else{
00181             return 0;
00182         }
00183     }
00184 
00185     Vector3WActor* WorldQueryTool::GetActorUnderMouse(Real RayLength, bool UsePolygon)
00186     {
00187         Vector3WActor* Results = 0;
00188 
00189         Ray* MouseRay = this->GetMouseRay(RayLength);
00190 
00191         if (UsePolygon)
00192         {
00193             Results = this->GetFirstActorOnRayByPolygon( *MouseRay );
00194         }else{
00195             Results = this->GetFirstActorOnRayByAABB( *MouseRay );
00196         }
00197 
00198         delete MouseRay;
00199         return Results;
00200     }

00202     Vector3* WorldQueryTool::RayPlaneIntersection(const Ray &QueryRay, const Plane &QueryPlane)
00203     {
00204         #define PHYSDEBUG
00205         #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00206         this->GameWorld->LogStream << "WorldQueryTool::RayPlaneIntersection("<< QueryRay << ", " << QueryPlane << ")" << endl;
00207         #endif
00208         try{
00209             Vector3 u = QueryRay.To - QueryRay.From;
00210             Vector3 p0 = Vector3(0,0,0);
00211 
00212             if(QueryPlane.Normal.X == 0 && QueryPlane.Normal.Y == 0 && QueryPlane.Normal.Z == 0)
00213             {
00214                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00215                 this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:Invalid Plane. Plane contains no points.");
00216                 #endif
00217                 return 0;
00218             }
00219             else{
00220                 if(QueryPlane.Normal.X != 0)
00221                 {
00222                      p0 = Vector3(QueryPlane.Distance,0,0);
00223                 }
00224                 else if(QueryPlane.Normal.Y != 0)
00225                 {
00226                      p0 = Vector3(0,QueryPlane.Distance,0);
00227                 }
00228                 else
00229                 {
00230                      p0 = Vector3(0,0,QueryPlane.Distance);
00231                 }
00232             }
00233 
00234             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00235             GameWorld->LogStream << " WorldQueryTool p0: " << p0 << " QUERYPLANE D:" << QueryPlane.Distance << endl;
00236             #endif
00237 
00238             Vector3 w = QueryRay.From - p0;
00239 
00240             Real D = u.dotProduct(QueryPlane.Normal);
00241             Real N = -1 * w.dotProduct(QueryPlane.Normal);
00242 
00243             Real SMALL_NUM = 0.00000001;
00244 
00245             if( (D<0? -D : D) < SMALL_NUM)  //Checks if the Plane behind the RAy
00246             {
00247                 if(N == 0)
00248                 {
00249                     return new Vector3(QueryRay.From);
00250                 }
00251                 else
00252                 {
00253                     #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00254                     this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error: num<SMALL_NUM: Ray casted with no intersection point.");
00255                     #endif
00256                     return 0;
00257                 }
00258             }
00259 
00260             Real sI = N/D;
00261 
00262             if(sI < 0 || sI > 1) //checks if the ray is too long
00263             {
00264                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00265                 this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:(si<0 || si > 1: Ray casted with no intersection point.");
00266                 #endif
00267                 return 0;
00268             }
00269 
00270             Vector3 test =  Vector3(QueryRay.From + (u * sI));
00271 
00272             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00273             this->GameWorld->LogStream << "WorldQueryTool: RayPlane Intersection RESULTS   X:" << test.X << " Y:" << test.Y << " Z:" << test.Z << endl;
00274             #endif
00275 
00276             Vector3* return_vector = new Vector3(QueryRay.From + (u * sI));
00277 
00278             Real distance = return_vector->Distance(QueryRay.From);
00279 
00280             if(distance > QueryRay.From.Distance(QueryRay.To))
00281             {
00282                 #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00283                 this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:Ray casted hits plane but is not long enough.");
00284                 #endif
00285                 return 0;
00286             }
00287 
00288             #ifdef PHYSDEBUG
00289             this->GameWorld->LogStream << "Distance:" << distance << endl;
00290             #endif
00291 
00292             return return_vector;
00293         } catch(exception e) {
00294             //In case we divide b
00295             this->GameWorld->Log("WorldQueryTool Error:Failed while calculating Ray/Plane Intersection, Assuming no valid intersection. Error follows:");
00296             this->GameWorld->Log(e.what());
00297             return 0;
00298         }
00299     }

00301     Ray* WorldQueryTool::GetMouseRay(Real Length)
00302     {
00303         Ray* MouseRay = new Ray( this->GameWorld->GetCameraManager()->GetDefaultCamera()->GetCameraToViewportRay(
00304                 float(this->GetMouseX()) / float( this->GameWorld->GetGraphicsManager()->getRenderWidth() ) ,
00305                 float(this->GetMouseY()) / float( this->GameWorld->GetGraphicsManager()->getRenderHeight() )
00306             ) );
00307 
00308         (*MouseRay) *= Length;
00309         return MouseRay;
00310     }

00313     // Private Members
00314     void WorldQueryTool::GetMeshInformation( Ogre::Entity *entity,
00315                                 size_t &vertex_count,
00316                                 Ogre::Vector3* &vertices,
00317                                 size_t &index_count,
00318                                 unsigned long* &indices,
00319                                 const Ogre::Vector3 &position,
00320                                 const Ogre::Quaternion &orient,
00321                                 const Ogre::Vector3 &scale)
00322     {
00323         bool added_shared = false;
00324         size_t current_offset = 0;
00325         size_t shared_offset = 0;
00326         size_t next_offset = 0;
00327         size_t index_offset = 0;
00328         vertex_count = index_count = 0;
00329 
00330         Ogre::MeshPtr mesh = entity->getMesh();
00331 
00332 
00333         bool useSoftwareBlendingVertices = entity->hasSkeleton();
00334 
00335         if (useSoftwareBlendingVertices)
00336         {                                   //10,000th line of code
00337             entity->_updateAnimation();
00338         }
00339 
00340         // Calculate how many vertices and indices we're going to need
00341         for (unsigned short i = 0; i < mesh->getNumSubMeshes(); ++i)
00342         {
00343             Ogre::SubMesh* submesh = mesh->getSubMesh( i );
00344 
00345             // We only need to add the shared vertices once
00346             if(submesh->useSharedVertices)
00347             {
00348                 if( !added_shared )
00349                 {
00350                     vertex_count += mesh->sharedVertexData->vertexCount;
00351                     added_shared = true;
00352                 }
00353             }
00354             else
00355             {
00356                 vertex_count += submesh->vertexData->vertexCount;
00357             }
00358 
00359             // Add the indices
00360             index_count += submesh->indexData->indexCount;
00361         }
00362 
00363 
00364         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00365         vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertex_count];
00366         indices = new unsigned long[index_count];
00367 
00368         added_shared = false;
00369 
00370         // Run through the submeshes again, adding the data into the arrays
00371         for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < mesh->getNumSubMeshes(); ++i)
00372         {
00373             Ogre::SubMesh* submesh = mesh->getSubMesh(i);
00374 
00375             //Ogre::VertexData* vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? mesh->sharedVertexData : submesh->vertexData;
00376             Ogre::VertexData* vertex_data;
00377 
00378             //When there is animation:
00379             if(useSoftwareBlendingVertices)
00380             {
00381                 //    #ifdef BUILD_AGAINST_AZATHOTH
00382                 //             vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? entity->_getSharedBlendedVertexData() : entity->getSubEntity(i)->_getBlendedVertexData();
00383                 //    #else
00384                 vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? entity->_getSkelAnimVertexData() : entity->getSubEntity(i)->_getSkelAnimVertexData();
00385                 //    #endif
00386             }else{
00387                 vertex_data = submesh->useSharedVertices ? mesh->sharedVertexData : submesh->vertexData;
00388             }
00389 
00390             if((!submesh->useSharedVertices)||(submesh->useSharedVertices && !added_shared))
00391             {
00392                 if(submesh->useSharedVertices)
00393                 {
00394                     added_shared = true;
00395                     shared_offset = current_offset;
00396                 }
00397 
00398                 const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertex_data->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00399                 Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = vertex_data->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00400                 unsigned char* vertex = static_cast<unsigned char*>(vbuf->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00401 
00402                 // There is _no_ baseVertexPointerToElement() which takes an Ogre::Real or a double
00403                 //  as second argument. So make it float, to avoid trouble when Ogre::Real will
00404                 //  be comiled/typedefed as double:
00405                 //      Ogre::Real* pReal;
00406                 float* pReal;
00407 
00408                 for( size_t j = 0; j < vertex_data->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vbuf->getVertexSize())
00409                 {
00410                     posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00411                     Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00412                     vertices[current_offset + j] = (orient * (pt * scale)) + position;
00413                 }
00414 
00415                 vbuf->unlock();
00416                 next_offset += vertex_data->vertexCount;
00417             }
00418 
00419 
00420             Ogre::IndexData* index_data = submesh->indexData;
00421             size_t numTris = index_data->indexCount / 3;
00422             Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr ibuf = index_data->indexBuffer;
00423 
00424             bool use32bitindexes = (ibuf->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00425 
00426             unsigned long*  pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(ibuf->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00427             unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00428 
00429 
00430             size_t offset = (submesh->useSharedVertices)? shared_offset : current_offset;
00431             size_t index_start = index_data->indexStart;
00432             size_t last_index = numTris*3 + index_start;
00433 
00434             if (use32bitindexes)
00435             {
00436                 for (size_t k = index_start; k < last_index; ++k)
00437                     { indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k] + static_cast<unsigned long>( offset ); }
00438             }else{
00439                 for (size_t k = index_start; k < last_index; ++k)
00440                     { indices[ index_offset++ ] = static_cast<unsigned long>( pShort[k] ) + static_cast<unsigned long>( offset ); }
00441             }
00442 
00443             ibuf->unlock();
00444             current_offset = next_offset;
00445         }
00446     }
00447 }
